trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ProfileEventArgs class during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a classe de ProfileEventArgs durante o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>eventos para especificar um perfil de utilizador personalizadas.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the ProfileEventArgs parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se, quando o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento estiver concluída, o parâmetro ProfileEventArgs o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>tem respetivo <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>propriedade definida como um valor que não é `null`, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>utiliza o valor da <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs"></xref> class.

The ProfileEventArgs creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A> property to the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: O ProfileEventArgs cria uma instância de <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>classe e define a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A>propriedade especificada <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para o pedido atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>objeto fornece informações de evento para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento da <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de contexto fornece acesso para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>do pedido atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para o pedido atual

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user profile for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o perfil de utilizador para o pedido atual.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Profile property during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade de perfil durante o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>eventos para especificar um perfil de utilizador personalizadas.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its Profile property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the Profile property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se, quando o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento estiver concluída, o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>parâmetro do <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>tem a propriedade de perfil definida para um valor que não é `null`, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>utiliza o valor da propriedade de perfil na atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> does not set the Profile property for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>não defina a propriedade de perfil para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>eventos.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> only gets the value of the Profile property when the code in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>apenas obtém o valor da propriedade de perfil quando o código de <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento estiver concluída.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: If the Profile property is not explicitly set by application code during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event, the Profile property value will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de perfil não for explicitamente definida pelo código da aplicação durante o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento, o valor da propriedade de perfil será `null`.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: The user profile to use for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de utilizador a utilizar para o pedido atual.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
